title: Inboxes
creator: mallardsreach8
content: Imported mail from Desktop to phone (No Problem) Now I just need to know where the inboxes are for each of my three accounts. It shows Outbox and unified inbox, which I have disabled as I oly want to see each individual inbox. On the phones home screen, the Thunderbird icon has a number three on it. How do I get to see the three emails?
